title: Print, "Fashion Plate for Woman's", 1826
medium:
Black ink, hand-colored watercolor
Support: off-white wove paper
inscribed: In printed ink, along top margin: Modes de Paris 381; along bottom margin: Petit courrier des Dames./Boulevard des Italiens No. 2 pres le passage de l'Opera./Modes de long champs./Robe de cotepali une garnie de volans brodes en laines. Chapeau de paille de riz.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Fashion Plate for Woman's", 1826.
1826. Black ink, hand-colored watercolor
Support: off-white wove paper. Gift of Cooper Union Library. 1980-36-5211.
